column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Lauren - Thanks for your review. We're never going to be all things to all people
column2: but will continue to strive in our culinary niche. As far as price goes
column3: the majority of goods and services you will find in Midtown will tend toward the pricier side
column4: largely due to popularity of location and average rental prices. What our establishment
column6: must pay in terms of rent and basic services is remarkably higher than if you were to travel just five miles in any direction. For instance
column7: my general manager who lives across the street pays $1
column8: 850 per month for a one-bedroom apartment.
